edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback

Class CommentsDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback.CommentsDataSource

  • public class CommentsDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Persistent data storage for Comment using a database defined in MySQLiteOpenHelper. This reuses code from Android SQLite database and content provider - Tutorial by Lars Vogella.
    Author:
    ellen.spertus@gmail.com (Ellen Spertus)

      Constructs a CommentsDataSource.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection to the database, opened with open().
      void open()
      Opens a connection to the database, creating it if necessary.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommentsDataSource

        public CommentsDataSource(Context context)
        Constructs a CommentsDataSource. The open() method must be called before retrieving data from this.
        Parameters:
        context - required context for the associated SQLiteDatabase

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws SQLException
        Opens a connection to the database, creating it if necessary. This should be called before any of the other methods. When the connection is no longer needed, close() should be called.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database could not be opened

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the connection to the database, opened with open().
